1.content: You can now controle anything when you ware this watch said a booming voice. John then woke up with a watch on his wrist. John not believing it wanted to try it on...
1.title: The beginning

11.content:
"If this works" he said out loud "I will become a ... Girl". In a flash John looked like this http://i.imgur.com/3DNzq.jpg
"OH MY GOD IT WORKED" But what now
11.title: Himself

choices: Jessie has a urge on Adam
111.content: John or for now Jessie wanted to stay a girl, and her room changed to a Girly verision of your old room. Then a knock was heard and she opened the door to see a friend of his with a rose. He was Adam, and Jessie's Boyfriend. "Hey There Baby." Adam spoke and then kissed her. "How was your day?" Adam added while giving her the rose.
111.title: Jessie meets her Boyfriend

choices: You say you dont want to do it.
1113.content: Jessie starte to feel a bit wet, which showed his mind was also changed a bit. Adam then kissed her and then Jessie wanted him so badly, you take him by the hand and lead back to your bed. Adam spoke, "Jessie, are you sure you want me to do this?
1113.title: Jessie has a urge on Adam

choices: Sam his friend who is a girl
13.content: John wanted to mess with one of his friend but who?
